# Delphi Epidata R API Client

```{r libraries}
# remotes::install_github("cmu-delphi/epidatr")
library("epidatr")
library("magrittr")
```


```{r}
epicall <- covidcast("fb-survey", "smoothed_cli", "nation", "day", "us", epirange(20210405, 20210410))
```


```{r}
epicall %>% fetch()
```

```{r}
delphi(system = "ec", epiweek = 202006) %>% fetch()
```
